TopicTitle: [Part] [1.9] Graphotron [v1.5.1, March 9, 2020] - Track & Plot Sensor & Flight Data

Articles.Content: I've never noticed before, but Graphotron uses EC when it is plotting. I think this should be something made known very plainly and perhaps even include an option to disable EC draw.

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, Drew Kerman said:
> 
> 
> I've never noticed before, but Graphotron uses EC when it is plotting. I think this should be something made known very plainly and perhaps even include an option to disable EC draw.
> 

I assume you mean Electric Charge, and yes, I agree that should be made known - and perhaps even done away with entirely.

[https://github.com/Ezriilc/KSP-Graphotron/issues/10](https://github.com/Ezriilc/KSP-Graphotron/issues/10)

> 
> 
> 56 minutes ago, Ezriilc said:
> 
> 
> I assume you mean Electric Charge, and yes, I agree that should be made known - and perhaps even done away with entirely.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://github.com/Ezriilc/KSP-Graphotron/issues/10](https://github.com/Ezriilc/KSP-Graphotron/issues/10)
> 

User switchable option would be great... I prefer to have such mods use EC for realism...

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, Stone Blue said:
> 
> 
> User switchable option would be great... I prefer to have such mods use EC for realism...
> 

Thanks for your input!  ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

As an example, VOID has a user toggle button for using EC or not... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Hi [@Ezriilc](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/34556-ezriilc/)! Do you have plan to update this wonderful mod?

Thank you!

Yes, eventually.  ~~I'm having some IDE issues.~~

~~In the meantime, you can use the BETA-3 we have up, as it seems to also work in KSP 1.4.2.~~

EDIT:  I think I was conflating this thread with my other mod's.  I'm not currently aware of any problems with Graphotron on the latest version of KSP,  but then I haven't done any testing.  This doesn't mean I don't intend to, I simply overlooked it and didn't get any support requests.

Check to be sure you are compiling against .Net 3.5

> 
> 
> 6 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:
> 
> 
> I just cloned it, compiled against 1.5.1 and ran it, it worked perfectly, including making a png
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Check to be sure you are compiling against .Net 3.5
> 

Yep, I have been, and thanks!  I'll do some more testing to see if I can break it again.

I never used this before, it's an interesting mod.  But I think you can/should add more sources.  For example:

- Throttle %
- Elevator % or angle in degrees
- Rudder % or angle in degrees
- Airelons % or angle in degrees

> 
>

> 
> 
> Yep, I have been, and thanks!  I'll do some more testing to see if I can break it again.

Another idea, think about adding some text, such as a title to the graph.  Allow the user to enter the title.

Also, would be nice to see the time tics at the bottom, say, every 10 seconds or so
